channel.title: Comments for page "Bow of Windia"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: on some other games i (used to) play, windia is/was a master archer woman who protected some unimportant townâ€¦

item.title: Possible Reference
item.content:encoded: This might be a vague reference to the Breath of Fire video game series. In nearly all of the BoF games, the character Nina is related (ususally the princess) to a kindom of "Windia" or a "Wyndia". However, in every game she was a caster-type character that used either rings or rods (not bows).
